item.title: This Amazing Trick Will Show You How to Backup Your iPhone 7 to PC - Without iTunes!
item.description: Introduction Are you an iPhone 7 user? If so, you know how important it is to backup your device regularly. But did you know that you can backup your iPhone 7 to a PC without using iTunes? In this blog post, we’ll show you how to do just that! Overview of iPhone 7 The iPhone 7 is Apple’s flagship device. It features a powerful A10 Fusion processor, a larger battery, and a sleek design.
